amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $1,789,000,000 and including the amount made available for program direction and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $1,789,000,000 and including the amount made available for program direction and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 110 - 310 (Roll no. 376).
